short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes docroot path to docroot url

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes docroot path to docroot url. 
Please Do not forget to use Options menu to set "Allow access to file URLs" checked!
Also use the options menu to change path and url.
